item.title: Email to Mahonri Manjarrez. Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist?
item.description: From: [Key witness/whistleblower’s name, redacted for privacy] Subject: Special Agent in Charge? FBI case number? FBI Victim Specialist? Date sent：2023-01-27 17:32 (Beijing time +0800) To: Mahonri Manjarrez (FBI, Language Specialist US Government) Cc: Adam Rogalski (Assistant Legal-Attaché), [Edward Lehman], and many more people (I will try to update this section soon) My reference for this case: USA-v-McDonalds-pattern-of-racketeering-activity Dear Mr. Manjarrez, As a victim of the transnational criminal enterprise orchestrated by the criminal entity McDonald’s Corporation, I would like to ask you three questions:
